open.title: Vumatel Reach Outage | Soshanguve
open.description: Vumatel has informed us of a network outage affecting Vumatel Reach clients in Soshanguve, affected clients will experience no connectivity. Vumatel engineers are working on resolving this issue as soon as possible. We sincerely apologise for any inconvenience caused.

open.title: MetroFibre Outage | Sunninghill, Kyalami and surrounding areas
open.description: MetroFibre has informed us of a network outage affecting Sunninghill, Kyalami, and surrounding areas, affected clients will experience no connectivity. MetroFibre engineers are working on resolving this issue as soon as possible. We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience caused.

updates.content: Metrofibre Engineers are reprovisioning affected clients to restore services. We apologize for the inconvenience caused by the outage.
Metrofibre are conducting emergency maintenance to resolve the outage as soon as possible. We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience caused.
